org.easyrules.jmx

Class DefaultJMXRulesEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easyrules.core.AbstractRulesEngine<JMXRule>
      • org.easyrules.jmx.DefaultJMXRulesEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RulesEngine<JMXRule>, JMXRulesEngine<JMXRule>

    public class DefaultJMXRulesEngine
extends AbstractRulesEngine<JMXRule>
implements JMXRulesEngine<JMXRule>
    Default JMXRulesEngine implementation. This implementation handles a set of JMX rules with unique names.
    Author:
    Drem Darios (drem.darios@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • registerJMXRule

        public void registerJMXRule(JMXRule rule)
        Description copied from interface: JMXRulesEngine
        Register a rule in the rules engine registry. This method also registers the rule as a JMX bean. The rule object must be JMX compliant.
        Specified by:
        registerJMXRule in interface JMXRulesEngine<JMXRule>
        Parameters:
        rule - the rule to register

      • unregisterJMXRule

        public void unregisterJMXRule(JMXRule rule)
        Description copied from interface: JMXRulesEngine
        Unegister a rule from the rules engine registry. This method also unregisters the rule from MBean server.
        Specified by:
        unregisterJMXRule in interface JMXRulesEngine<JMXRule>
        Parameters:
        rule - the rule to register
